Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class Worker

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Worker
public class Worker
extends java.lang.Object
the Worker class contains all the information of a worker

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int height
    if the worker is on a tower this attribute represents his height in this way it's not needed to go in the box and his tower to have this information
    private Box position  
    private int posX  
    private int posY  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Worker​(Box b)
    the constructor is called only after having selected the first position of the worker

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void build​(Box where)
    this method is used by the worker to build in the selected cell
    void build​(Box where, Block nextBlock)
    this method is used by the worker to build a specified block in the selected cell
    Box getPosition()  
    void move​(Box to)
    changes the current position of the worker
    void swap​(Worker opponentWorker)
    Swaps the positions of two workers.
    java.lang.String toString()  
    private void updatePosition()
    updates the informations of the worker such as coordinates (taken from the box where the worker is placed) and his height

  • Field Details

    • position

      private Box position

    • height

      private int height
      if the worker is on a tower this attribute represents his height in this way it's not needed to go in the box and his tower to have this information

    • posX

      private int posX

    • posY

      private int posY

  • Constructor Details

    • Worker

      public Worker​(Box b) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, BoxAlreadyOccupiedException
      the constructor is called only after having selected the first position of the worker
      Parameters:
      b - workers position
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if the box parameter is null
      BoxAlreadyOccupiedException - when b is already occupied by another worker

  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move​(Box to) throws MoveErrorException
      changes the current position of the worker
      Parameters:
      to - box where the worker moves to
      Throws:
      MoveErrorException - if the box where the worker wants to move is not adjacent to his current box

    • swap

      public void swap​(Worker opponentWorker) throws MoveErrorException
      Swaps the positions of two workers. Method added to complement move, swap does not change box.isOccupied() state two consecutive moves would leave one box flag in the wrong state.
      Throws:
      MoveErrorException

    • getPosition

      public Box getPosition()
      Returns:
      the position of the worker

    • updatePosition

      private void updatePosition()
      updates the informations of the worker such as coordinates (taken from the box where the worker is placed) and his height

    • build

      public void build​(Box where)
      this method is used by the worker to build in the selected cell
      Parameters:
      where - the build box

    • build

      public void build​(Box where, Block nextBlock)
      this method is used by the worker to build a specified block in the selected cell
      Parameters:
      where - build box
      nextBlock - the block being built

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      a string containing the basic information of the worker
